eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Josephine; Jackson; Douglas; Curry; Coos; Klamath, OR; at 02:39 PM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 05:39 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This station is testing its emergency alert system equipment. Originating from Josephine County Emergency Management.   In cooperation with public safety, broadcasters, and cable operators, this system informs you of events that pose an immediate threat to life or property. If this had been an actual emergency requiring immediate action or evacuation, official messages would follow the alert tone.  This is only a TEST.
